name: At the Strike of MidKnight (Lunasticks, ToxiFun, Jazatic, Fuglefar)
name_original: At the Strike of MidKnight (Lunasticks, ToxiFun, Jazatic, Fuglefar)
description:
A knight's duty is to fight... Even when cursed by a horrible witch.

Fight through a neverending gauntlet of enemies, but beware, when the clock strikes midnight, you'll be hit with a horrible curse for the rest of the night!

And the night after that, not only do you get a new curse, all your previous terrifying curses are still in effect!

How many days can you survive?

Developed in 42 hours for the Create Jam Fall 2020 Edition under the themes "Fairytale" & "At The Strike of Midnight".

Made by First Year Frat Boys:

Alex - Artist / Sound Designer / Composer

Jakob - Artist / Animator

Tobi - Programmer / Writer

Tonko - Programmer / Fixes Tobi's code when it doesn't work
